context: Mid-sized SaaS company (500 employees) evaluating budget increase for customer success team to improve retention rates

request.purpose: Expand customer success team and implement retention programs
request.justification: Current churn rate of 8% vs industry average 5%, projected revenue impact of $2M annually

decision_process.outcome: Strong support from sales and product teams

business_impact.expected_outcome: Reduce churn by 3%, increase customer lifetime value by 15%

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Churn reduced to 6.2%, team productivity up 25%
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Churn at 5.1%, revenue impact $1.1M, ROI achieved

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement critical for complex initiatives, phased hiring approach minimized disruption. ROI analysis should include qualitative benefits like employee satisfaction and brand reputation. Regular progress check-ins with stakeholders improved buy-in and reduced scope changes.
